actions.committee: House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.
Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the use of Federal funds for certain activities designed to support or defeat any legislation pending before the Congress or any State legislature or any legislation or legislative issue on the ballot in any State.

summary.text: Prohibits the use of Federal funds by any corporation wholly owned by the Federal Government for the purpose of influencing any legislative issue before Congress, any State legislature, or on the ballot of any State.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use of Federal funds for certain activities designed to support or defeat any legislation pending before the Congress or any State legislature or any legislation or legislative issue on the ballot in any State.
